definition: to scare/to intimidate/to threaten/(interjection showing disapproval) tut-tut/(interjection showing astonishment)

sentences.english: I'm feeling goose bumps now. I was having death threats, I never felt safe for 3 and a half years.
sentences.chinese: 有人恐吓说要我的命，那三年半我没有一点儿安全感。

sentences.english: The Death Star was to be an instrument of terror, meant to cow treasonous worlds with the threat of annihilation.
sentences.chinese: 死星是恐怖的工具，用毁灭来恐吓叛国的星球。

sentences.english: But private investors may have been durably scared by the union's display of clout.
sentences.chinese: 但是私人投资者受到工会的这政治上的强烈恐吓。

sentences.english: How to deal with someone who intimidates you.
sentences.chinese: 如何处理与某人谁恐吓你。

sentences.english: Did the movie producer have the courage not to be bluffed?
sentences.chinese: 这个电影制作人有没有能力承受住恐吓？

sentences.english: Under the threat that is 9, the flying cloud finally betrayed mu yao.
sentences.chinese: 在尚九城的恐吓之下，那云飞终于出卖了慕瑶。

sentences.english: The drowsy browser knits its brows to browbeat the frowzy crow.
sentences.chinese: 昏昏欲睡的吃草动物皱眉头恐吓邋遢的乌鸦。

sentences.english: I laughed in my sleeve at his menaces .
sentences.chinese: 对于他的恐吓，我暗自好笑。

sentences.english: Just as terrorists have taken advantage of the openness of our society to carry out their plots, violent extremists use the internet to radicalize and intimidate.
sentences.chinese: 暴力极端分子利用互联网来实现极端激进和威胁恐吓。

sentences.english: I'm nearly done analyzing the threatening letters.
You will be punished by law for your intimidatory behavior.
sentences.chinese: 你的恐吓行为会遭到法律的制裁。

sentences.english: Those blackmailers intended to squeeze more money out of him.
sentences.chinese: 那些恐吓者打算向他榨取更多的钱。

sentences.english: They purposefully keep people misinformed and fearful through their control of the media.
sentences.chinese: 他们有目的地通过所控制的媒体来误导和恐吓民众。

sentences.english: He frightened the old lady into signing the paper.
sentences.chinese: 他恐吓那位老太太签了字据。

sentences.english: She threatened the children with a walloping .
sentences.chinese: 她恐吓孩子说要狠狠打他们一顿。

sentences.english: Are you ready to see the frilled lizard in full scare mode?
sentences.chinese: 你准备好看处于完全恐吓模式下的皱褶蜥蜴了吗？

definition: to use gain as a lure
to disturb/to cause a commotion/to harass
to beat up/to come to blows/battery (law)
